text: I just finished watching Breaking Bad on Netflix. It's one of the best shows ever made.
Apple released the new iPhone 15 Pro Max yesterday at their headquarters in Cupertino.
BTS announced their world tour and fans from the BTS Army are already buying tickets.
I'm reading The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien. Peter Jackson's movie adaptation was also excellent.
Tesla's Model 3 has become the best-selling electric vehicle in Europe.
The Rolling Stones performed at Madison Square Garden last night. Mick Jagger is still incredible at 80.
Microsoft acquired Activision Blizzard, the company behind Call of Duty and World of Warcraft.
Anonymous claimed responsibility for hacking several government websites in protest.
Taylor Swift's album The Tortured Poets Department broke streaming records on Spotify.
I ordered a PlayStation 5 from Amazon but it won't arrive until next week.
